channel.title: Help with the armadyl chestplate & platelegs !@!@!@!@!@
channel.description:
The item code for the armadyl chestplate is 15346 i spawn it, it appears in my inventory. When i try to weild the PLEASE HELP!!!!!
armadyl chest plate its glitched. like it will take my weapon slot and only the top half of the plate is showing and the rest of my torso is invisible. Very simalar problem with the legs and pretty much with every item where its ID is over 5 numbers. Can someone help?
I also relize that this is mostly a simple fix but i really need help. Also my source and client is Xell scape[and to the guy who posted xell scape. when you download the files you got the client and source backwards XD]
Another thing if you are bored enough to help. how can i add skill cape emotes to my server. it is just a regular 317 interface. There is no skillcape emote button. I think i need a 474 interface?
No need for mean posts, if you don't want to help me just move on.

item.title: Help with the armadyl chestplate & platelegs !@!@!@!@!@
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

iMrNigga:

Source —> Item.java —> Ctr+F —> [public static int platebody[] = { ] —> Put your armadyl chest plate id —> Save it —> Complie it —> Taste it

Thank you for the step by step, it helped me soooo much! thanks

[quote=“failz, post:3, topic:347562”][quote author=iMrNigga link=topic=443941.msg3259846#msg3259846 date=1278407928]
Source —> Item.java —> Ctr+F —> [public static int platebody[] = { ] —> Put your armadyl chest plate id —> Save it —> Complie it —> Taste it
[/quote]

you need to add its definition
also add it in public static int body if its in items.java

if you dont know what a defintion is its these ill

item = ITEM ID Armadyl_chestplate Armour_of_great_craftsmanship. 16300000 100000000 36000 -7 -7 -7 -15 33 56 48 61 70 57 0 1
item = ITEM ID Armadyl_plateskirt A_plateskirt_of_great_craftsmanship. 16300000 100000000 36000 -6 -6 -6 -10 20 32 26 34 40 33 0 1[/quote]
Thank you for the items information XD

Read full topic
item.source: Help with the armadyl chestplate & platelegs !@!@!@!@!@
